html:
the Lord said unto me. The Lord told Isaiah to "Go, set a watchman."

Go, set a watchman. The watchman may be Isaiah himself (21:11), all the true prophets of all ages (Jer. 6:17; Ezek. 3:17), or all of God's true witnesses who warn their neighbors and cities of approaching invaders or impending danger; "And in that day all who are found upon the watch-tower, or in other words, all mine Israel, shall be saved" (D&C 101:12).
